START A FREE TRIAL

We Make Staffing & Payroll Easy!

Here's how it works:

1. Easily Find Talent

Setup you job and role preferences, publish shifts, and access a talent pool of thousands of rated job seekers.

2. Hire & Manage Schedules

Hire the best candidates, Automatically send employees job locations/shift times, and track employee performance with GPS located clock-in/out features.

3. Simplify Payroll

Download instant payroll reports and easily pay employees via ACH directly to their bank accounts.

Outdated staffing & payroll processes drain your time & resources

It's time to escape the norm and leave traditional hiring behind. Bottomless piles of resumes and paperwork, constant back-and-forth from HR, training to accommodate inexperienced new hires... it just doesn't make sense. Easily filter through experienced, pre-vetted staff in minutes. Our intuitive staffing platform matches you with the workers you need when you need them.

JobCore Talent provides an easy to use end-to-end experience for all types of businesses in the hospitality industry.

Maximize Productivity

Fluctuations in availability and changes in customer behavior are regular challenges the hospitality industry endures and can't avoid, but why allow it to affect your business operations?

With JobCore Talent, these challenges are easily avoided by giving your talent pool the option to choose the shifts they prefer to work; thus significantly increasing productivity.

Streamline Workforce Hiring & Scheduling

Why deal with staffing agencies, inefficient hiring platforms, and expensive payroll systems when you can access thousands of rated job seekers manage your workforce, and do payroll all in one place? Quickly and easily fill your talent pool with pre-vetted, qualified workers from JobCore Talent.

Enjoy full transparency and control from your dedicated online business portal.

Maximize Productivity

Your hospitality staff should boost your bottom line, not increase your operating expenses. That's why JobCore Talent created an all-in-one, cost efficient platform to streamline all your staffing and payroll needs and reduce expenses.

JobCore Talent's staffing solution also increases productivity levels which saves you money in the long run by decreasing wasted employment hours.

Employers can manage talent & payroll

Employers create their calendar shifts, recruit workers from our curated pool, communicate, schedule, pay and rate them quickly and efficiently.

  • Setup your shift and preferences
  • Publish shifts to hundreds of curated talents
  • Hire the talents you want
  • Rate talents
  • Talent clocks-in / out using our app
  • Manage payroll and pay faster
  • Smart tracking and reports
  • Everything employers need in one platform!
